mapper.insert: insert into users( name, username, password, city, address, phone, email, image, grade, birth, sex, user_uuid, nickname ) values( #{name}, #{username}, #{password}, #{city}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{image}, #{grade}, DATE_FORMAT(#{birth}, '%y%m%d'), #{sex}, #{userUuid}, #{nickname} )
mapper.select: select id as "id", province as "province" from provinces order by id asc;
select id as "id", province as "province", city as "city" from cities order by id asc;
select count(username) from users where username = #{username}
select count(phone) from users where phone = #{phone}
select count(email) from users where email = #{email}
